languages.text: "Фантастика! Но как?! Как вам удалось? Господа пирующие, поднимем же кубки за несокрушимость избранни{mf|ка|цы} Бога-Императора!" {n}Вся тассерианская знать поднимает золотые кубки — в вашу честь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Фантастика! Но как?! Как вам удалось? Господа пирующие, вы были свидетелями! Истинного Вольного Торговца не сломить даже нашему ядреному тессерцу! Поднимем же кубки за несокрушимость избранника Бога-Императора!" {n}Вся тессерианская аристократия поднимает золотые кубки — в вашу честь.{/n}

languages.text: "Incredible! But how? How did you accomplish it? My fellow revellers, let us raise our cups to the unbreakable strength of the God-Emperor's emissary!" {n}The entire Thasserian nobility lift their golden goblets in your honour.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Фантастика! Но как?! Как вам удалось? Господа пирующие, поднимем же кубки за несокрушимость избранни{mf|ка|цы} Бога-Императора!" {n}Вся тассерианская знать поднимает золотые кубки — в вашу честь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Fantastic! But how?! How did you accomplish it? My fellow revellers, let us raise our cups to the unbreakable strength of the God-Emperor's emissary!" {n}The entire Thasserian nobility raises their golden goblets in your honour.{/n}

"Fantastic! But how?! How did you accomplish it? My fellow revellers, let us raise our cups to the unbreakable strength of the God-Emperor's emissary!" {n}The entire Thasserian nobility raises their golden goblets in your honour.{/n}

"Fantastic! But how? How did you accomplish it? My fellow revellers, let us raise our cups to the unbreakable strength of the God-Emperor's emissary!" {n}The entire Thasserian nobility lift their golden goblets in your honour.{/n}

"Fantastic! But how? How did you accomplish it? My fellow revellers, let us raise our cups to the unbreakable strength of the God-Emperor's emissary!" {n}The entire Thasserian nobility lift their golden goblets in your honour.{/n}

"Incredible! But how? How did you accomplish it? My fellow revellers, let us raise our cups to the unbreakable strength of the God-Emperor's emissary!" {n}The entire Thasserian nobility lift their golden goblets in your honour.{/n}

"Incredible! But how? How did you accomplish it? My fellow revellers, let us raise our cups to the unbreakable strength of the God-Emperor's emissary!" {n}The entire Thasserian nobility lift their golden goblets in your honour.{/n}

languages.text: “这简直是难以置信！大人，您究竟是怎么做到的？各位狂欢的朋友们啊，让我们举杯，为神皇的使者无与伦比的力量干杯吧！”{n}所有塔瑟拉贵族都举起了手中的金质高脚杯，向你致敬。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Incredible! But how? How did you accomplish it? My fellow revellers, let us raise our cups to the unbreakable strength of the God-Emperor's emissary!" {n}The entire Thasserian nobility lift their golden goblets in your honour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这简直是难以置信！大人，您究竟是怎么做到的？各位狂欢的朋友们啊，让我们举杯，为神皇的使者无与伦比的力量干杯吧！”{n}所有塔瑟拉贵族都举起了手中的金质高脚杯，向你致敬。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Increíble! ¿Pero cómo? ¿Cómo lo ha hecho? ¡Mis festivos camaradas, alcemos nuestras copas y brindemos por la indómita voluntad {mf|del emisario|de la emisaria} del Dios Emperador!». {n}Todos los nobles thasserianos levantan sus dorados cálices en tu honor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Incredible! But how? How did you accomplish it? My fellow revellers, let us raise our cups to the unbreakable strength of the God-Emperor's emissary!" {n}The entire Thasserian nobility lift their golden goblets in your honour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Increíble! ¿Pero cómo? ¿Cómo lo ha hecho? ¡Mis festivos camaradas, alcemos nuestras copas y brindemos por la indómita voluntad {mf|del emisario|de la emisaria} del Dios Emperador!». {n}Todos los nobles thasserianos levantan sus dorados cálices en tu honor.{/n}

languages.text: "İnanılır gibi değil! Bu nasıl olur? Bunu nasıl yaptınız? Sefama ortak olan sevgili arkadaşlarım, kadehimizi Tanrı İmparator'un elçisinin sarsılmaz gücüne kaldıralım!" {n}Tüm Thassera soyluları, altın kadehlerini senin şerefine kaldırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Incredible! But how? How did you accomplish it? My fellow revellers, let us raise our cups to the unbreakable strength of the God-Emperor's emissary!" {n}The entire Thasserian nobility lift their golden goblets in your honour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İnanılır gibi değil! Bu nasıl olur? Bunu nasıl yaptınız? Sefama ortak olan sevgili arkadaşlarım, kadehimizi Tanrı İmparator'un elçisinin sarsılmaz gücüne kaldıralım!" {n}Tüm Thassera soyluları, altın kadehlerini senin şerefine kaldırıyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「信じられません！でも、一体どうやって？どうやってそれを成し遂げたのですか？お仲間の皆さん、この神帝陛下の使者の不屈の強さに乾杯しましょう！」{n}タッセーラ人の貴族全員が、あなたを讃えて金のゴブレットを上げる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Incredible! But how? How did you accomplish it? My fellow revellers, let us raise our cups to the unbreakable strength of the God-Emperor's emissary!" {n}The entire Thasserian nobility lift their golden goblets in your honour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「信じられません！でも、一体どうやって？どうやってそれを成し遂げたのですか？お仲間の皆さん、この神帝陛下の使者の不屈の強さに乾杯しましょう！」{n}タッセーラ人の貴族全員が、あなたを讃えて金のゴブレットを上げる。{/n}

languages.text: « Incroyable ! Mais comment est-ce possible ? Comment avez-vous pu accomplir un tel exploit ? Mes chers amis, levons nos verres à l'inébranlable force de l'émissaire de l'Empereur-Dieu ! » {n}Quantité de gobelets dorés se lèvent en votre honneur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Incredible! But how? How did you accomplish it? My fellow revellers, let us raise our cups to the unbreakable strength of the God-Emperor's emissary!" {n}The entire Thasserian nobility lift their golden goblets in your honour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Incroyable ! Mais comment est-ce possible ? Comment avez-vous pu accomplir un tel exploit ? Mes chers amis, levons nos verres à l'inébranlable force de l'émissaire de l'Empereur-Dieu ! » {n}Quantité de gobelets dorés se lèvent en votre honneur.{/n}

languages.text: "Unglaublich! Aber wie? Wie ist Euch das gelungen? Meine werten Feiergäste, erheben wir unsere Kelche auf die unbezwingbare Stärke {mf|des|der} Gesandten des Gottimperators!" {n}Der gesamte Adel von Thassera erhebt seine goldenen Kelche zu deinen Ehren.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Incredible! But how? How did you accomplish it? My fellow revellers, let us raise our cups to the unbreakable strength of the God-Emperor's emissary!" {n}The entire Thasserian nobility lift their golden goblets in your honour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Unglaublich! Aber wie? Wie ist Euch das gelungen? Meine werten Feiergäste, erheben wir unsere Kelche auf die unbezwingbare Stärke {mf|des|der} Gesandten des Gottimperators!" {n}Der gesamte Adel von Thassera erhebt seine goldenen Kelche zu deinen Ehren.{/n}
